mapper.insert: INSERT INTO file_node ( file_name, is_dir, parent_id, course_id, class_id, uploader_id, sectiondir_id, file_type, section_id, last_file_version, is_current_version, file_size, visibility, created_at, updated_at, file_url, file_version, object_name ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{isDir}, #{parentId}, #{courseId}, #{classId}, #{uploaderId}, #{sectiondirId}, #{fileType}, #{sectionId}, #{lastVersionId}, #{isCurrentVersion}, #{fileSize}, #{visibility}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt}, #{url}, #{version}, #{objectName} )
mapper.update: UPDATE file_node SET file_name = #{name}, is_dir = #{isDir}, parent_id = #{parentId}, course_id = #{courseId}, class_id = #{classId}, uploader_id = #{uploaderId}, sectiondir_id = #{sectiondirId}, file_type = #{fileType}, section_id = #{sectionId}, last_file_version = #{lastVersionId}, is_current_version = #{isCurrentVersion}, file_size = #{fileSize}, visibility = #{visibility}, created_at = #{createdAt}, updated_at = #{updatedAt}, file_url = #{url}, file_version = #{version}, object_name = #{objectName} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT fn.* FROM classuser cs JOIN file_node fn ON cs.class_id = fn.class_id AND fn.parent_id IS NULL WHERE cs.user_id = #{userId}
SELECT * FROM file_node WHERE class_id = #{classId} AND parent_id IS NULL AND is_dir = true

SELECT * FROM file_node
parent_id = #{parentId}
AND ( file_name = #{title} OR file_name REGEXP #{regexTitle})
AND file_type = UPPER(#{type})
AND section_id = #{chapter} and is_dir = false
WITH RECURSIVE node_tree AS ( SELECT * FROM file_node WHERE id = #{folderId} UNION ALL SELECT f.* FROM file_node f INNER JOIN node_tree t ON f.parent_id = t.id ) SELECT * FROM node_tree

SELECT id FROM file_node WHERE parent_id = #{parentId} -- 只匹配形如 basename(数字) 的文件名 AND file_name REGEXP CONCAT('^', #{baseName}, '\\\\([0-9]+\\\\)$') -- 并且提取数字后，比当前名称中的数字小 AND CAST(REGEXP_SUBSTR(file_name, '[0-9]+') AS UNSIGNED) < CAST(REGEXP_SUBSTR(#{currentName}, '[0-9]+') AS UNSIGNED) ORDER BY -- 按提取到的数字降序取最大 CAST(REGEXP_SUBSTR(file_name, '[0-9]+') AS UNSIGNED) DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM file_node WHERE parent_id = #{parentId} AND file_name = #{name}
SELECT EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM file_info WHERE file_name = #{name} AND is_dir = false )
SELECT is_dir FROM file_node WHERE id = #{id}
